item.title: PBR
item.description: score:-6 Chances: Petrobras expects another 40 years of oil production, indicating long-term sustainability. Petrobras’ second FPSO begins operations, signaling operational progress. Exclusive insights suggest Petrobras may increase investments in its new 5-year plan. Petrobras awards 5-year service contract and initiates call for SHF radio links, indicating operational growth.
